page.title: 14EASTON GREY HOUSE
page.content: Travelling from Sherston to Malmes_ bury you may see a sign for Easton Grey House.When you turn in at the gate through an avenue of trees which in Spring is a mass of daffodils & blue bells,you are doing,as many thousands do each year,visiting the {Boutique in a garden}& the Garden Restaurant.Next to Mrs.Saunder's Queen Anne house is the Boutique,which is filled with beautiful clothes & lovely gifts. It attracts visitors from all over{Britain.The Restaurant has a wine licence,& serves refreshments. You can spend the day at Easton Grey ,and walk in the gardens leading down to the River Avon. The house has a very gracious interior with a splendid free standing stone staircase.There is an Adam Fire_ place.{Interior designers David Hicks {& Tom Parr}assisted with the "decor".
